title: SE0001 - Selenium Webdriver Script Needed to perform clicking actions with different IPs
snippet:
Hi there,

I need someone to help me produce a selenium script to help me perform the following actions:

1. click on a click from a web page. 
2. visit the web page and scroll the page up and down slowly as if it is reading the content. 
3. stay on the page for 66 seconds and repeat action 2. After 66 secs, please close the page. 
4. change ip once the action 3 has been completed. 
5. change device code once the action 4 has been completed. 
6. once the action 4 has been completed, please repeat the action sequence from action 1.  

You can see this is a loop and I need to be able to install this script to a linux server and run the script 24/7. 

There might be small customizations, such as 1) adjusting the secs staying on the page
or 
2) continue perform clicking actions once the page is open, before closing the page. 

We can discuss it in more details once you apply for this job. 

Please leave me your skype id if you think you can do this and the time needed for this job.

Thank you.
